data.title: ‘The Young and the Restless’ Spoilers: Christel Khalil (Lily Winters) Baby Bump Update, Shows How Beautiful Pregnancy Can Be
data.meta_description: ‘The Young and the Restless’ Spoilers tell all about star Lily Winters (Christel Khalil), who recently took to Instagram to show her adorable
data.text:
‘The Young and the Restless’ (Y&R) spoilers tell all about star Lily Winters (Christel Khalil), who recently took to Instagram to show her adorable baby bump and give an update.

In June, Christel was in Monaco promoting “The Young and the Restless’ 50th-anniversary celebration. Christel revealed she is pregnant with her second child. Christel and her partner, Sam Restagno, are expecting!

‘The Young and the Restless’ Spoilers: Christel Looks Confident and Healthy

Khalil has been engaged to Restagno since April 2022 and is very excited to start their family. Khail has been posting updates on Instagram. In the picture, Christel is looking confident and healthy.

The photo is black and white; she is standing by some tropical-looking palm trees. Her hair is down loose, softly blowing in the California breeze.

Khalil exclaims, “Getting closer to meeting our baby boy!” In her Instagram story, in the next photo, she provides a beautiful close-up of her standing with hands gently touching her baby bump, celebrating the joy of motherhood and demonstrating what a proud mama bear she is.

Next, you see Christel and her fiancée together, looking as if they are almost dancing, both of them beaming with happiness.

‘The Young and The Restless’ Spoilers have said that Many people have taken to Instagram to congratulate Christel and participate in the celebration with her and her wonderful partner. One person wrote,

“Oh, my goodness, congratulations. I couldn’t tell you were pregnant on TV. Oh, I’m so happy for you and your husband; congratulations, you are such a beautiful girl.”

Another person posted,

“I watch you on Y&R every day, hidden behind a laptop or a box or a coat, and I keep thinking that if they weren’t hiding you, I would never have even guessed you were pregnant. You look magnificent- the picture of health. A beautiful, glowing mum-to-be.”

One thoughtful fan said,

“Best wishes and prayers on a smooth delivery and a healthy baby boy.”

Another Y&R watcher exclaimed,

“You’re so lovely. Pregnancy becomes you. Can’t wait to see this little one.”

‘The Young and the Restless’ Spoilers: Christel and Sam’s First Baby Together

This baby boy will be Khalil and Restagno’s first child together. Khalil had a lovely baby shower in October, as they shared their excitement and delight with some family, friends, and some of Christel’s co-stars at the Draycott restaurant in Pacific Palisades with a baby shower to remember.

Some of Khalil’s guests included co-stars Victoria Newman (Amelia Heinle), Sally Spectra (Courtney Hope), and Devon Winters (Bryton James). James is godfather to Christel’s first child, her 13-year-old son, Michael Cadenfrom her previous marriage to Stephen Hensley.

At first, when Khalil announced she was expecting, fans weren’t sure if her character, Lily, would become pregnant. She is, after all, dating Daniel Romalti Jr. (Michael Graziadei). Young and the Restless has been hiding her pregnancy well, as many fans took to Instagram to say they couldn’t even tell the actress was pregnant.

Photographer Nikki Fininn has been capturing all the fantastic photos. From Christel’s baby shower to her photos on Instagram, Christel has been happy to share with her fans.

Motherhood is such a blessed occasion, and Christel and Sam couldn’t be happier to bring a new bundle of joy into the world! You can see Christel’s sweet photos on Instagram.
